::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus was listening in and remembering all the times in the past he had fought Unicron. When he unleashed the power of the Matrix in 2005, orbiting Cybertron. When Unicron's plan for a new body with the help of Starscream's ghost was ruined. When many of the forces on this planet came together with a super weapon to drive Unicron off the last time, leaving only the Minions.

Now Rodimus placed his hand on his chest, knowing that when he returned to this planet the last time, after over throwing the Tripredacus rule over Cybertron, he came prepared.

Rodimus: "One day, one shall rise from our ranks and light our darkest hour."

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  Doc: Roger that, Perseus.

 must do something to ward him off. How did you fight him off in the past?
